original_text: And these are the years of the life of Ishmael, an hundred and thirty and seven years: and he gave up the ghost and died; and was gathered unto his people.
korean_text: 이스마엘은 향년이 백삼십칠 세에 기운이 다하여 죽어 자기 백성에게로 돌아갔고

sentences.original_text: And these are the years of the life of Ishmael
an hundred and thirty and seven years
and he gave up the ghost and died
and was gathered unto his people
